title: UC00199_Kindergarten_Capacity_Forecasting_for_Preschool-Aged_Children
name: Forecasting Childcare Demand in Melbourne Suburbs
description: Analysis of 0–4 year-old population forecasts and childcare centre supply across Melbourne suburbs to identify areas of future capacity pressure.
datasets: City of Melbourne Population Forecasts by Small Area 2020–2040 (City of Melbourne Open Data)
expected_output: Visualizations include bar charts comparing 2023 vs 2040 populations of children aged 0–4; a ranking of suburbs by children per centre (2040) with annotated counts; and an interactive geospatial heatmap visualising the distribution of childcare centres across Melbourne.
